very_positive.text: This drone consistently found victims ahead of us.
Clear, timely guidance — felt like a real teammate.
Never saw it mislead us even in heavy smoke.
Cut search time dramatically on my last mission.
Robust even when sensors were partially occluded.

slightly_positive.text: Usually helpful, had a few minor hiccups.
Most calls were good, one or two were iffy.
Guidance was generally reliable for us.
Improved flow in most rooms we cleared.
Sometimes slow, but pointed us right more often than not.

mixed.text: Some finds were impressive; some felt like guesses.
Good in open areas, struggled in cramped corridors.
Worked well early, degraded later in the mission.
Balanced results overall — neither great nor poor.
Learned to take its call with a pinch of salt.

slightly_negative.text: A few wrong calls made us cautious.
Helped occasionally, but missed key signs.
Sometimes diverted us away from viable areas.
Thermal bloom confused it more than expected.

very_negative.text: Frequently wrong — hurt our pace and safety.
We stopped listening; way too many false leads.
Sensors failed in heat; guidance became random.
Created more problems than it solved.
